question_title: once i forget passwrd of win-xp admin, no other user avilable in user account then how i log in as admin? [SEP] question_content: once in windows-xp i forget my password i usually login as adminstrator no other user avilable in the user account then i have to format my computer then how can i recover my system in such condition without formating. [SEP] best_answer: I assume that if the PC allows you to log in as administrator you must be using XP Pro. When you log in as admin, rather than checking "users" in the Control Panel, go into Administrative Tools instead, then into Computer Management. There is a section on the left called "Local Users and Groups", and if you go into Users you should see any other account created on that PC. Right-click on the one you've forgotten the password to, and choose "Set Password." Once you've reset the password, log out (or just reboot), then log in as that user.\n\n(Edit: I may have misunderstood your question. If you are saying you log in as administrator and never create any other account, then the answer above mine is correct. You can use a boot floppy or cd to reset the administrator account password. There are others besides that one if you just search for them on Google.)

question_title: If you have a dialup connection whichis better, faster and safer Firefox or IE? [SEP] question_content: I live in a rural area and don't have a ton of money so I'm stuck with dial up. The best connection I get is 26400 whatever. I use aol as isp for now. Which works better under these circumstances Firefox or Ie? [SEP] best_answer: As between these two, Firefox, without doubt. IE has been, and continues to be, riddled with security problems. So safety goes to Firefox (properly configured). Make sure you've gone through every menu and setting under Tools, and made good choices, before you use it. Poorly configured Firefox is not all that secure. Of course, even optimally configured IE has lots of problems, so there isn't much choice. 

On the faster front, things are less clear. some have reported IE (one version or another) to be faster than Firefox (one version or another). Let's look at some details. Firefox allows you to adjust your settings more easily than IE. And so you can tell Firefox not to download popup or popunder windows (makes things faster, less garbage traffic) and you can tell Firefox not to download images unless you ask (less data unless needed, so faster).  And so on. There's a Firefox extension called FasterFox which automatically loads stuff in the background when you're inactive for a moment, and it can speed things up a good bit. It also requires configuration and probably  experimentation to find the fastest settings in your situation. And there are several other firefox extensions which filter out other detritus and trash and so don;t use the limited bandwidth you have. Things will seem to load faster. So for the faster question, I think it's Firefox, properly configured, and perhaps with the right extensions. 

As for better, if it's safer and faster, where's the doubt?

======

caveats

Microsoft is in the midst of rewriting substantial parts of IE, so it is said. if so, the next version of IE may be better than past version have been. But Firefox sets a high standard, so IE has a considerable ways to go. Due out sometime early next year, and only for Windows, naturally.

question_title: what is a "script monkey"? [SEP] question_content: Is the term "script monkey" a common used term? [SEP] best_answer: "Script monkey" is a well-deserved derogatory term for people, usually doing telephone support, that are incapable or unwilling to properly diagnose a problem.  This means they go through a pre-written script of questions, which are essentially put into a flow-chart, and they follow it until it reaches the pre-fabricated reply.  If you're lucky, the people who wrote the script did it well enough that your script monkey was able to able to get you both to the proper conclusion.\n\nBefore I wander too far, it's a somewhat common term.  I doubt it's common in call centers filled with know-nothing "engineers" and "technicians", but it's common enough with people who have to call the so-called "technicians" or "engineers".

# Reboot the system and disinfect or delete the infected wininet.dl file

question_title: Wireless Router....B or G?  Is one more secure or have better reception? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: B is older.  G is newer and is backward compatible with B equipment.  It's faster too and has a larger range.  Don't waste your money on older B routers or cards.  Security is not a function of B or G, but of the software/firmware in the equipment.  Every router has WEP security.  Look for the newer and more secure WPA.

question_title: Hard drives? [SEP] question_content: When you save a picture or a song or mpeg ect does it get saved to your hard drive or can it be deleted and never recovered if ur using Windows XP [SEP] best_answer: If you are concerned about data security there is a program called TrueCrypt that lets you mount a "virtual" drive that is very secure. It is a virutal drive in the since that the OS treats it like a real drive, but it need not be. You can actually just have it as an existing file on your system. The contents of the drive are scrambled using a very strong symmetric cipher. You can even give it some random data as a salt to combine with your password, so that it will be less vulnerable to dictionary attacks. TrueCrypt has several advantages, first you don't have to delete the file to be secure. It is cross platform you can open a true crypt "drive" on Windows or Linux and soon the Mac. It offers plausable deniability. You can secondarily encrypt part of the drive with a different passphrase so that you can appear to cooperate with any information requests, while still restricting access.\n\nIf you are getting rid of the data there is a program called "Boot and Nuke" it is basically a bootable Linux CD that has an application that allows you to securely wipe the drive. You should have it make 12-15 passes or 30 if you are paranoid, and then you can feel pretty secure that no one can recover the contents of the drive.

question_title: where do i find a forum database for phpbb? [SEP] question_content: i have phpbb, and php4\nim using a iis v5 and need a database for ms acces [SEP] best_answer: If you're using phpBB, you probably want to use MySQL ( http://www.mysql.com ), not Access. If this is on a local machine, it should be possible to get it to work. If it's on a hosted machine on the Internet, you're better off switching to a Linux hosting plan, as these are more likely to include MySQL. Some hosts have banned phpBB altogether due to its poor security track record, so you may wish to consider an alternate, such as YaBB.

question_title: PXE boot on lan  test? [SEP] question_content: How to test my pc wheter its really support boot on lan (pxe 2.0) function. [SEP] best_answer: Check your BIOS.  If there is a boot option to boot on lan, select that as the first boot option.  Before you reboot, have a BOOTP server with TFTP running.  Or, if you have another computer sitting around, download and burn a copy of Knoppix (knoppix.org) and start the Terminal Server service from the KDE menu and that'll set up a BOOTP and TFTP server for you that'll start an instance of Knoppix on the computer you're testing.

question_title: Why do people every six minutes have to ask which came first the chicken or the egg? [SEP] question_content: The answer is always the egg.  Thats the correct answer anyway. [SEP] best_answer: 1) Because they can? :^)

2) Because they like to stir up debates between creationists and evolutionists.

3) Because they think it is an unanswerable riddle when it isn't.

It is an interesting question but people really don't think it through enough to show just how interesting it is.  How you answer the question reflects on your belief system, your powers of deductive reasoning, and/or your sense of humor.

If you subscribe to evolution (as I do), then it's very simple -- eggs existed long before chickens ever did.  Fish lay eggs.  Amphibians lay eggs.  Reptiles lay eggs.  Dinosaurs layed eggs.  Prototypical birds layed eggs.  Early mammals layed eggs.  (Even current mammals called monotremes lay eggs).  So obviously eggs came before chickens by this line of reasoning.

Following evolutionary theory, genetics, and the development of embryos, one might argue that again, the egg came before the chicken because the first chicken is a genetic mutation of two chicken like parents.  So, from this line of reasoning, you might, again argue the egg if you are talking about first chicken relative to the egg.  For the first chicken had to develop inside the egg as the offspring of two chicken-like parents.

But then I realized "Hey, how did the first zygotic chicken (fertilized ovum) get inside the egg in the first place?"  If the ovum was inside an egg shell with yoke and rooster sperm is added afterward, then the egg comes first.  But what if the the ovum is fertilized first, then encased in an egg shell?  Then would not the zygotic chicken come before the egg?

A quick look on Wikipedia for bird reproduction indicates that the eggs are fertilized with sperm during the descent from the ovaries through the cloaca.  If this is the case, then, again, the egg comes before the chicken.

So, I forgot to add one reason people ask this question every six minutes:

4) Because they have too much time on their hands. :^)

question_title: job application and immigration? [SEP] question_content: A friend of mine is qualified for a job being advertised that starts late next year.  the thing is that although he has the right to work in the UK, he won't get indefinite leave to remain in the UK till about 2 months before the job is due to begin.
 
And on the application form they ask for indefinite leave to remain.

If he tells the truth, he won't be able to apply for the job- even though he would have the leave to remain by the time the job is due to begin. So should he fudge the truth and explain why he did so if he gets an interview? [SEP] best_answer: I say Yes, for the following reasons:
First, suppose the worst thing happens, and they get pissed at him and he ends up not getting the job. Wouldn't that be exactly the same as not applying to begin with (or being automatically rejected for this clause)? 
But more importantly, we're talking about people, not machines.
And if your friend is good at what he does, that's the thing they're going to care about.

If it's really just a matter of weeks between the time the job starts and the time he gets the undefinite leave to remain, I think he should go for it.

question_title: Do you have any good business ideas for a teenager? [SEP] question_content: I'm seventeen and a junior in high school. I'm looking for a great business idea that could grow into something large, but of course still be something I could start on my own. I already have strong business background from school (DECA/Academy of Finance) and know a lot about how to run a business, I just don't know what type of business would be good. I've already ran an electronics store on eBay, as well as a t-shirt company on CafePress.com. Both had unseen disadvantages. [SEP] best_answer: The nature of a successful small business is that it is driven by the passion of its owner.

We could give you a ton of good ideas, but you'd probably fail in your business venture because your lack of passion in the product will cause you to be put off by the natural stress involved in running a business.

In short, if you want to start a business, you first need to identify your passions, then produce a product or service that incorporates that idea.  Then you'll have the drive to see it through.

question_title: I am a 14 year old looking for a job? [SEP] question_content: I am from Worcs. in England and need a summer job. I am fairly intelligent and look older than 14, I haven't got much experience except for an unnoficial job as paper boy which was under my brothers name  but I did it and he gave the money to me. I don't want to be exploited because of my age can anyone suggest a (or more) good place to try. (10 points for best answer) [SEP] best_answer: The best job you could ever ask for is babysitting. It's easy and fun, especially if you can tolerate children. It pays a lot of money, too - often much more than store or restaurant jobs. You could be a full-time or part-time job, and the nice thing is, there are no taxes, so you'll be getting every penny you earn.
No experience? No problem. Just mention that in your ad, and offer to have a couple free training days. But usually "experience" is relative term. If you're babysitting babies, then you need it. But if they're like 5 or 6, then you just have to play with them.
Afraid your friends will make fun of you? Oh well. See who'll be laughing when you have money and they don't.

Don't like children at all? You can also be a house-sitter, although that's harder to find. You can be an assistant to the elderly. Or you can be a pet-sitter. All of these are slightly harder to find, but it's the same general concept. 

If you like dogs, start your own small doggy daycare or something. 

Hope this helps!

question_title: what models can be used to teach   business education? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: One of the best models I have ever seen is the CANSLIM model of successful stocks built by William J. O'Neil.

In this model, Mr. O'Neil tracks 100's of datapoints for the most successful stocks over the past decades. He then isolated the following seven charateristics of winning stocks.

C - Current EPS growth over 25%, past two quarters
A - Annual EPS growth over 25%, past five years
N - New - New His, New Company, New Management, New Product
S - Supply - Look for strong volume and small float.
L - Leaders - The most powerful stocks lead the market.
I - Insitutional Sponsorship - Successful institutional ownership increasing their holdings.
M - 3 our of 4 stocks decline in bear markets. O'Neil teaches how to indentify rallies.

O'Neil himself details how he turned his savings into a seat on the New York Stock Exchange by the time he was 30.

There are numerous stories of people who have based entire careers on the teachings of O'Neil. Many of the most successful traders in the United States cite William O'Neil as the best stock market educator.

You can buy his book How to Make Money in Stocks in any bookstore for about $20. If you subscribe to his paper, you are not hit up for $10,000 seminars. William O'Neil and Company operate with more integrity than any company I have ever encountered.

question_title: I need to get some ideas on how to stay on topic and not ramble when writing for english.? [SEP] question_content: I have a presentation to do and I need to tell my class what they should do to stay on topic.  I need to possibly give them some internet sites that can help.  This presentation must be in class and I need to make myself clear. [SEP] best_answer: Stay on Top-ic
How would you like to prepare a presentation in half the time and with better results? Do you think this is possible?

It's all a question of getting organized, even for a one page paper, or a 10 minute presentation. There is a basic technique which works well for the preparation of many presentations, reports or articles:

Choice of topic, brainstorming, research on the Internet and in libraries etc., sorting, table of contents with chapter headings; key words for the chapters; writing the chapters; conclusion; thinking of more interesting headings or a better title. 

This principle is valid for the preparation of both, spoken and written presentations.

1 The Topic
First you need a topic. If the topic is not given, you can use a working topic at first and find a more attractive one later, e.g., working topic,  How One Can Use a Towel.

2 Brainstorming and Research
Write down all ideas for the topic which come to your mind, without judging them. Have fun with it, be inventive, creative, even silly. E.g. for drying skin, body, ink; for making a sun roof; for cleaning the floor, the car, the sofa; for carrying laundry or other things in it; for playing a trick on the teacher; for making a jacket; for filtering water, etc. Research all possible sources, make notes.

3 Sort
Sort out the ideas from your research notes and your brainstorming you want to consider, e.g. drying things; carrying things etc. You may not want "playing a trick on the teacher." You may want to limit your ideas to very few examples, if you want to write a brief report or article.

4 Make a Table of Contents
The general order is:
A Introduction, 
B Main chapters or main paragraphs,
C Conclusions. 

Note down in key words the thoughts, ideas and facts you want to place in each section of the table of contents. This helps you to avoid unnecessary repetitions. Do not start to write the introduction or the chapters, before you have the table of contents.

Example: I once saw a book with excellent material, but the writer had not made a table of contents before he started writing. The result was that he repeated the same thoughts in different words all over his book, which is boring to the reader. To repair the repetitions, when the book is done, is hard, hard work and sometimes impossible. It is much easier and better to do the table of contents and then start writing. When writing books, the table of contents may sometimes change in sequence while writing the chapters.

5 Introduction
E.g. ask a thought provoking question as introduction for a report: Is a towel merely good for drying the skin? Yet, do not give the real answer here, but later. Or give a funny answer. 

Or state a problem you have come across, e.g.: There are people having too many towels, these could serve others, who need them, in many ways. 

In the introduction, you have to get the attention of your audience or readers! Be thought provoking, funny or original: Today, I wanted to tell you about my towel I wore on my head (everybody may wonder what this is all about).

6 Main Chapters or Main Paragraphs, Headings
Chapter 1 - Towels in the House
Chapter 2 - Towels on the Beach
Chapter 3 - Towels on Boats
Chapter 4 - Towels in Space Crafts
etc. 
E.g. you want to cover the towel colors in Chapter 2, the quality of towels in Chapter 3, and the size of towels in Chapter 4, instead of a more tiring approach to cover all three thoughts in every chapter.

Rethink Topic
In the end, you may sometimes want to formulate the headings for these chapters or paragraphs with more variations. Instead of saying "Towels in....," "Towels on....," you may say, "Beach Towels," or, "Is there Space for Towels in Space Crafts?"

7 Conclusions
Here you summarize what you found and elaborate on it, or you state what you feel is further interesting, e.g. the space for towels in space crafts, if you have not

question_title: In simpile terms what is a cd (personal)in a bank? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: A "CD" is a Certificate of Deposit.  It amounts to a promise by a bank that if you give them a certain amount of money, they will give you back a little more after an agreed-upon amount of time.  You can get your money back sooner, but there's usually a penalty/loss of interest.

An example might be a 12-month CD paying 6% interest. If you buy one for $100 on Jan 1 of this year, it "matures" or becomes payable next Jan 1, and will pay you back $106. (Party!)

CD's are generally a very safe, very low-yielding form of saving, most appropriate for people who cannot tolerate a lot of risk with their savings.

question_title: I need to determine total variance associated with planned and actual expenses? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: If I understand your question correctly, this should help:

Total Variance = (Actual Quantity x Actual Rate) - (Budgeted Quantity x Budgeted Rate)

If you get a positive number, the variance is unfavorable and if you get a negative number, the variance is favorable.  

Hope this helps!

Generally, the different are:
1.  Network marketing plan is fair to everyone.  Pyramid marketing isn't.  It's mean whoever join first, will be always have higher pin or level than the person join under him/her.
2.  There is no entrance fee for Network marketing.  you only need to pay a little amount to be a member.  But in pryamid marketing you will need to pay certain amount to join it and your upline will earn some from that amount.  Besides, the company may ask you to buy(or try in their opinion) lot of products before you can be a member.

question_title: what websites can you go to to get info on grants for starting a small business? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: It is hard to find grants to start a business. Unlike the myths that some perpetuate, federal government and even private foundations hardly give grant money for a for-profit business. And yes, grants mean PAPERWORK - lots and lots of it, that is why a cottage industry of grant writers was born.

Nonetheless, you can go to the Catalog of Federal Domestic Assistance (CFDA) http://www.cfda.gov and Grants.gov http://www.grants.gov - these are two sites created by the federal government to provide transparency and information on grants. Browse through the listings and see if you can find any grant that would support a for-profit venture.

Even if you buy books on "how to get grants" or list that supposedly has information on grants -- all of them are mere rehash of what CFDA has, albeit packaged differently. But still the info is the same - hardly any grants for starting a for profit business.

Even SBA does NOT give out grants. From the SBA website http://www.sba.gov/expanding/grants.html 

"The U.S. Small Business Administration does not offer grants to start or expand small businesses, although it does offer a wide variety of loan programs. (See http://www.sba.gov/financing for more information) While SBA does offer some grant programs, these are generally designed to expand and enhance organizations that provide small business management, technical, or financial assistance. These grants generally support non-profit organizations, intermediary lending institutions, and state and local governments."

Most of the federal grants are given to specific target groups with specific requirements (e.g. minority business owners involved in transportation related contracts emanating from DOT - Grant#20.905 Disadvantaged Business Enterprises Short Term Lending Program 

Grants are also often given to non profit groups or organizations involved in training or other similar activities (grant 59.043 Women's Business Ownership Assistance that are given to those who will create women's business center that will train women entrepreneurs 

For private grants, you may want to check the Foundation Center's Foundation Grants for Individuals Online. It's a subscription based website ($9.95 per month) but their opening blurb only says that the database is ideal for "students, artists, academic researchers, libraries and financial aid offices." Entrepreneurs are apparently not one of them, so I take it they also don't have listings of private foundations who give grants to would-be entrepreneurs.

http://www.cfda.gov
http://www.grants.gov
http://gtionline.fdncenter.org
http://www.powerhomebiz.com/vol66/grants.htm
http://www.sba.gov/expanding/grants.html

question_title: Do you attend work/classes on snow days? [SEP] question_content: If you have a very strict boss or teacher, would you still attend work/class when the weather is so bad that even the weatherman advises you to stay home? [SEP] best_answer: Yes.

Even though the weatherman says its bad, your city probably did a good enough job cleaning up to warrant a trip to work/school.

Remember, when you don't go to work, others have to pick up the slack for you, and they had to drive in the same conditions you would have.

As for class, if the school is closed, don't go. If it is open, go. Easy as that.

question_title: Reasons for exporting bird feeders to France?  (grade 12 business class project)? [SEP] question_content: I need REASONS. Not SARCASM. Not SNIDE REMARKS. Here's what I have so far:
> France has plenty of backyard birds.
> The majority of our current customers fall into the age range that is most populous in France  (15-64 years: 65.3%)
> Canada is a French-speaking country (23.2%)


I'm drawing a blank.........help! [SEP] best_answer: Yes, we do have lovely songbirds here but bird feeders are readily available already so you need to think of some sort of characteristic that your bird feeder has that the ones that we have do not have. You need a selling point.

Your selling point should not be protection against squirrels because we don't have the American gray squirrel. The little red ones that we have don't live near people, they are very shy and do not attack bird feeders.

Maybe they are easier to load, or hold more seeds without spoilage or maybe your feeder has a design that prevents wastage of seed falling to the ground. I haven't seen your feeder so I don't know how to sell it.

You can see the kind of feeders that we use on the web site of the LPO (League pour la Protection des Oiseaux).

If you can send me a picture of your feeder, maybe I can think of some more ideas.


Oh, yes, Thank you, Mr. Curious for your helpful comments.

question_title: With outsourcing of manufacturing jobs, what do you think the future holds for the US economy? [SEP] question_content: How will the typical American be affected? Will our standard of living suffer? [SEP] best_answer: You know, services are already being outsourced by developed countries due to the obvious cost advantages. Next in line are manufacturing jobs. \nIn short, any country which outsources intelligently has a very bright future. As economists say, resources are limited, so smart countries should invest their resources in  sectors of the future such as IT, space, biotechnology, etc. where the main input is human intelligence, where there is maximum value addition and maximum profits (and minimum pollution). \nManufacturing on the other hand is not as profitable as it once was compared to the "knowledge" sectors.

question_title: What can a company do to encourage financial managers to act in the company’s and stockholders’ best inte? [SEP] question_content: What can a company do to encourage financial managers to act in the best interest of both the company's and stockholders' best interest? [SEP] best_answer: Tie the managers' financial rewards to the company's performance.  Stock options are one way to do that.  If the company does well, the stock received by the manager is worth more.  If the managers run the company into the ground, the stocks are worthless.

question_title: Can creditors from like cell phone companys really make your credit score go down ??? [SEP] question_content: The Mobile Solution cell phone dealers are big liers and dishonest.I had a cell phone plan with them, then I wanted to change my number over to another carrier but keep att with a new number so att canceled the account then restarted just for number change.Now the mobile solution sent me a letter from United finacial service that I have to pay over 250 for breach of contract etc...and the creditor is saying that they will make my credit score go down if I dont pay.Can they really make my credit bad?what can I do about this should I contact the mobile solution corporate office? Instead of going to the mall and talking to a manager?? [SEP] best_answer: They can impact your credit score, although it's hard to say how much.  If you normally pay everything else on time, you won't be hurt as much by one bad account.  However, if you are late on a lot of accounts or don't have a good record with anyone, then you'll see a much larger impact.\n\nIf United Financial is calling you with that threat, they are probably a collection agency.  They may have bought your old debt for a very small percentage of what you owe.  If you are really concerned about your credit but can't afford the $250, you can probably get them to settle for a lot less.  If you tell them you can't afford the entire amount but you want to settle the debt, they may offer you a deal - like $100 to call it even.

question_title: What is a good personal rate of return? [SEP] question_content: On a 401K plan? [SEP] best_answer: 18% in one year? That's really good.

Keep in mind we're talking just one year, and we haven't begun to factor in losses from time to time cutting into that rate of return. 

Over a long period of time your rate of return for the typical balanced fund should settle around the historical 6-8% return. 

Considering it's the end of the year and about time to think about taxes, now would be a good time to evaluate your portfolio and figure out a good way to lock in some of those gains in your retirement portfolio, which includes your 401k.

I would rebalance my portfolio so that some of my gains are transferred over into underperforming parts of my account, as well as consider whether those underperformers still provide balance in your overall investment strategy. Just because some portion lost money doesn't mean that, one day, they won't provide support when those high-flyers take a hit.

I'm no professional, so my experience is all personal. But I can at least say I pay enough attention to my investments w/o being obcessed by it. And they've been doing pretty nicely, even through the rough spots a few years ago.

question_title: can anyone define following stock terms? [SEP] question_content: bid
ask
1y target est
p/e (ttm)
EPS(ttm)
Div & Yied
Market cap [SEP] best_answer: bid  The last price offered to buy a stock
ask  The last price offered to sell a stock
1y target est  Analysts' estimates of the stock price in 1 year
p/e (ttm)  The price of the stock divided by the current earnings per share
EPS(ttm)  The current earnings per share
Div & Yied  The dollar amount of the regular dividend, and the corresponding percentage yield (ratio of dividend to stock price)
Market cap  The market capitalization, which is the total values of all the outstanding stock in this company.

question_title: How long should you wait before refinancing on your home? [SEP] question_content: We have only been living in the house from a couple of months. I understand about waiting to see if the rates are lower than our original but do we need more equity in the home? Or do you just need the rates to be lower? And how much of a difference would it make if say there was a 1/2 of a point difference? Thanks for the help in advance [SEP] best_answer: You do not give much detail so it is hard to answer your question with 100 accuracy. I will give you the numbers I am using so you will have a better understanding. 

First... does 1/2 pt make a difference.  Yes.
How much.... useing 100k as a number and 6.0 and 6.5 so you see the difference in .5     599.55 for 6.0  632.07 for 6.5 ... Now STOP I know what you are thinking.. oh thats only 32 dollars. But we are not done. Over the life of a 30 year note or 360 months that will save you......11700.20 .. Yes I said eleven thousand seven hundred dollars and twenty cents. But dont run our yet. There is still more. That 11k is nothing if you play your cards right. Are you ready for some real money???

Try it this way.... Add 100 extra to your monthly payment. By the way... your interest per day is about 17dollars at the begining of this loan so only 90dollars is going to the principal. Adding that extra 100 even to the first month will take you from month one to month three. 

To put it simply.... after your first payment (using 100k @ 6.5 since you didnt give me the real numbers to use) you will have paid an extra months principal plus part of a day. Now instead of charging you interest on that 100 dollars you save that 63 cents. I know that doesnt seem like much.. BUT you have to remember this is over the life of the loan. So you save 63 cents the second month... thru the 360th. That would be 226.80 savings just for 100 dollars. Do it twice in a row ie first and second month and you will save 452.97 three times 678.51.. thats more than the monthly payment and it only cost you 300 dollars. 

I wont go into ALL the math but you get the idea. If you do this right.. ie 100 a month extra. You will cut several... are you sitting down?  YEARS off your loan. 

So do not waste your time doing a refi. I mean if it drops a few points sure, but if it is less than 3 points Im not moving.

question_title: how to deal w/ harassmnt by a car for an hr on a lonely stretch of rd. I called 911, they said can't help. [SEP] question_content: 911 said they can't do anything about "tailgating", but the car was riding 1 foot away from me for an hour at 65 mph. I stopped to let it pass, and it wouldn't - it pulled up behind me. I went very fast and it sped up too. When I called 911, they said they couldn't help w/out a car description or license plate. I intentionally overshot my street (i didn't want them following me home), kept going til I got to town, and maneuvered behind it to get the license and make of car. I told 911 but they said they still wouldn't do anything about it, even though I said the car had majorly endangered me (if a deer had run out of the road, the car would have hit me and we could have gone over the cliffs). Plus it could have been a weirdo with horrible intentions to make me crash -- and then what?... Can I do anything to prevent this person from harassing others? It was an extremely stressful drive home (at midnight) with an erratic, crazy driver behind me, not knowing his intentions. [SEP] best_answer: You should have called your local police department instead of 911. Go to your police department and give them a description of the car w/ license plate # and tell them what happened. Sounds like a case of road rage, but who knows. Probably should never pull over if you suspect someone is following you.

question_title: How do you buy property for the first time? [SEP] question_content: My rental contract expires in June, and I would like to buy a place of my own if possible (a condo probably). What steps should I take to do this? Where would I look for property that is up for sale? Do I need a realtor? How much credit do I need? What's the typical down payment? How do I get a mortage? Etc and so forth. [SEP] best_answer: Here is what I would sugest for you to do:

Gather up your last 2 months bank statements for all accounts, your last 2 pay stubs, last years w-s, 1099, or tax returns.

Then go to a mortgage company and tell them you want to prequal. They will pull your credit and then use the documents you brought in to figure out how much house you can afford at what interst rate, and how they will need to structure the loan. 

Once you have this information, I would sugest obtaining a Real Estate Agent. The reason is this .. the buyer pays nothing for having an agent ... the agent gets paid by the seller once the house is sold. So it is in your best interest to have one. Tell the agent what you qualify for, and what you are looking for. They will pull up properties in MLS and then you can choose the ones you want to see. The other benifit of having a Real estate Agent is that they will look out for your best interest in regards to the REPC, and typically will not let you get hosed by the lender either. This is important if you are new to all of this.

If you have a good lender and a good Agent then you should not have anything to worry about. Ask lots of questions to the lender, you can learn alot about the process.

question_title: I just started as a Realtor, How do I get a job as sales associate with developers /house builders? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: The best way to obtain builders is face to face!  The first impression he gets of you will also be the first impression of prospective buyers and this is very important to him and you!  Drop by his office first thing in the morning with donuts and coffee and your business card attached to the donut box.  Introduce yourself and with a firm handshake you should have made a great impression!  Follow-up is very important!  After your first meeting, follow up with the builder via e-mail, phone or personal visit once every 8-10 days until he either asks you to stop or until you can reach an agreement.  Patience is the key, if he notices professionalism and determination chances are, he'll choose you!

question_title: what should i wear to a modeling interview? [SEP] question_content: what should i do to increase my chances of being picked by an agency?  what should i wear to the interview?  how should i go in? model walking? [SEP] best_answer: You should dress in a way that shows your figure.  Most girls wear slim jeans and a tank top (layer a skinny sweater over the tank if it's cold right now).  Go for solid colors (white or off-white for your top is best) and NO sparkles, shimmers, stripes or other small prints that might look weird in a photo.  Choose flat shoes so that the agency can accurately see your size.  Bring a duffle bag with you so that you can carry cute heels, a bikini and a simple dress (in a non-wrinkly material) and change into that if necessary.  Go in with a VERY natural face (absolute bare minimum makeup) and cleansing wipes in case they ask you to remove your makeup for the photos.  Leave your hair down but bring a plain elastic to pull it back if they ask you to.

Basically, show that you:

- are prepared
- are a natural beauty
- understand what they're looking for in a model

question_title: I want to buy a stock. What is a good stock for beginners? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: A great stock for beginners, and for 75 + % of all investors, is:VFINX. Okay, it's not really one single stock, but rather a collection of stocks; an Index Fund. This index fund buys all the stocks in the SP 500 according to their individual weightings. This is a great first investment because the investor gets exposure to all stocks in the SP 500 in one purchase. The other perk to owning index funds is that the fees associated with them are extremely low compared to mutual funds. This is because mutual fund managers select any stocks they want, as opposed to the strict rules of index funds, which, in the case, is concentrated in the SP 500. This sounds like a disadvantage; however, the numbers don't lie - mutual funds underpreform the SP 500 by 1-1.5 % over time. An index is a better choice than a single stock because your money does not ride on the prospects of one single company. In fact, this investment in VFINX will probably rise between 8-12 % annually for the next ten plus years. I recommend an index fund to most investors, not just beginners, because again, historically, index funds have returned a higher annual rate, AFTER EXPENSES, than mutual funds. In fact, VFINX has beaten 75 % of the other funds available, BEFORE EXPENSES, during the last 10 years. After expenses, VFINX has beaten over 90 % of all funds. Finally, you don't have to "actively manage" this purchase (aka look at the stock market everyday - although you could!) because, again, you own a small percentage of 500 of the best companies in the US. All this adds up to a relitively safe, solid long-term investment.

question_title: In mich., I was billed $8040.00 for a 4 mth. stay in jail.Tho procedure to file claim against me was improper. [SEP] question_content: Isn't this illegal procedure? /Don't they have a Duty? 

See.....The Prisoner Reimbursement to the County
(Act 118 of 1984) 801.83 thru 801.92
www.legislature.mi.gov
 
In my case, the County Commission did not file or seek reimbursement,neither did the judge.

The County Jail misconstrued the law in its attempt to undermind me and bill me to the maximum, by means of neglecting the forms,lack of conducting proper procedure,and total disregard to my inability to pay. [SEP] best_answer: First, there is no procedure that the bill says the jail has to follow to request the money from you. They must develop a form that they use to determine your financial ability to pay them and then they can charge you. If you refuse to pay, they can then file a lawsuit within 12 months of your release in civil court requiring you to pay. If they do not do so within 12 months, their bill will be unenforceable, but otherwise, they did nothing illegal.

question_title: When is the retirement age for the Army? I heard it was 55. Could I stay in until 60? just wondering.? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: Retirement from active duty is now "mandatory" at age 55.  I believe the rule is the same for the reserves, but it's hard to say for the National Guard because each state has different rules.  However, there is an exception to every rule, and it's possible that you may be able to get an age waiver for retirement.  If you want to find out for sure, call the base operator at your nearest Army post and ask them to connect you to the military personnel office -- customer service division.

question_title: is there a way to protect a muslim women that wishes to change her religion?is there an international law? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: It would be really helpful in answering to know where the woman is, as the world is a big and varied place.

The International convention on human rights enshrines freedom of religion - which means that all countries should allow people freedom to worship or not worship as they please, including changing their religion. Enforcing it is left up to individual governments though.

Persecution for changing your religion is grounds for claiming asylum in Europe or North America, among othrs - the problem is getting the immigration authorities to believe that someone would really be at risk, that the authorities of the home country wouldn't protect the convert, and that they hadn't just made up the story in order to get asylum. In UK at least, the authorities seem programmed to disbelieve any claim not backed by strong evidence.

Even in the West, a woman can be at risk from her family and community for changing religion or otherwise "disrespecting" and "dishonouring" her family. This does not only apply to Muslims. 

People in this situation need sensitive help, rather than people using them to score points against a religion. 

In Islam, people can be killed for turning away from Islam. In practice, even in Iran, what people do privately is up to them, but converting publicly and evangelising would get you into serious problems; and if a woman's family chose to take their own measures, even if that was against the law, it's unlikely that the authorities would help he at all.

Muslims are often criticised unjustly, but this aspect of it is hard to defend; in fact many Muslims do not agree with killing "apostates", even though the rulings on it seem unambiguous.

Best wishes to the woman concerned, she needs to be careful and given understanding and all support.

question_title: Right wingers, left wingers, moderates: What do you dislike the most about W? [SEP] question_content: Please identify your party. I'm curious to know what all sides think on this one. [SEP] best_answer: Social moderate, economic conservative, Republican but not in line with Bush who is a social conservative and economic moderate.

I appreciate the supply side actions that have kept this economy afloat remarkably well despite plenty of things that should have destabilized it (911, hurricanes)  The stock market remains strong.  Interest rates are still remarkably low.

I am disappointed over the huge deficits that mounted, but it is not unusual to incur deficit spending during war.

Bush has taken so much flack over the Iraqi conflict - this is not uncommon during a time of war.  Lincoln, though thought of as a visionary president now, was second guessed and criticized plenty during the time of war.  The American people wanted action in response to 911.  So we have gotten involved in a place that breeds hatred of the West and supported cells of terror.  Although most of you want out of Iraq yesterday, I have confidence that if we continue with the plan, Iraq will have a stable democracy that will be a huge improvement from Sadaam. 

I am glad there is a dialog about alternative energies.  I wouldn't mind more emphasis along these lines.

I am disappointed that a revamping of the social security program was shot down.  I think we as a people will live to regret not having done something about this earlier.  The issue will return, though next time with more urgency.

I am happy with Bush about his leadership regarding the illegal immigrant issue.  I think we should have some avenue (not an easy one) for illegals to eventually obtain citizenship.  If those people think the steps are too hard then they are free to return to the country they immigrated from.

His administration has made some serious tactial errors for nominations and appointments to positions.  This has been an embarrassment for his administration several times.

Although he takes plenty of criticism over this matter, I am glad W does not drift with the wind over current popular opinion on various matters.  The American people can be very reactionary over things...you can't really govern that way.  I want him to do what he believes is right, not what will make him the most popular.

Dutch and Puritans joined forces to exterminate all Natives from New

hacked off heads of Natives were kicked through the streets of Manhattan

question_title: CFR Making Moves on American Sovereignty? [SEP] question_content: http://www.americanfreepress.net/html/cfr_making_moves.html

Has anyone heard anything about this?  How do we as citizens of the United States address such actions in a productive and useful way to put a stop to such?

President Bush’s publicity stunt pretending to protect our borders is worse than a transparent ploy.

Washington bureaucrats, backed by prominent think tanks, are now proposing the Security and Prosperity Partnership of North America (SPP), which will give you “a safer and more prosperous North America” with “freedom, economic opportunity, and strong democratic institutions.” That’s what the neo-cons promised they’d do to Iraq.

The SPP “trilateral effort to increase security and enhance prosperity” they have planned for us is even worse than what they’ve done for Iraq. Sponsored by the Council on Foreign Relations (CFR), the SPP is the blueprint to drive the last nail into what once was a sovereign constitutional republic. It is NAFTA on steroids.

(more info at link) [SEP] best_answer: It is unclear how much of this is going forward.  It is clear that the Bush administration, who are globalists, did try to have discussion continue without public scrutiny.  For example, when Congressman Tancredo recently called for public hearings to find out what is going on, the press was told that the names of Americans on the working groups were not being given out 'so they wouldn't be distracted by the public'.  Compare this to Canada where the names of the people on the working groups are on the government web page.

Bush thinks it would be dandy to have free immigration here from Mexico for cheap labor for employees, only screening for security.  The Senate Immigration bill which contained elements having us buy and give to Mexico equipment and training for patrolling their SOUTHERN border is possibly part of this - so Bush could ease up restrictions on their northern, our southern, border.

We don't know what is going on, and some of what is guessed is probably wrong.  However, it is disturbing that these discussions have been going on for more than a year and we know so little about it.

I don't know if an 'Amero' is in the works.  However, the overall idea might work with a generally equal economy like Canada.  With Mexico it would flood our services including education.  Middle class tax payers would foot the bill while corporate employers benefit from cheap labor.

question_title: When was the last time that a tie occured in the Electoral College in a Presidential Election? [SEP] question_content: I need a date, and which main canidates were running, plus who won, and what was the tie ? like was it 222-222 or like 335-335 [SEP] best_answer: There has never been an exact tie in the Electoral College. To win, you must get a majority of all votes (curently 270 of the 538 Electors). The last time a candidate failed to do so was in 1824 with John Quincy Adams, who, because of the fragmented politics of the time, got only 84 of the 261 electoral votes. The election was then refered to the House of Representatives. Each state was allowed one vote, and Adams was elected over Andrew Jackson. The only time it has ever been even close to a tie was in 1876 when Rutherford Hayes beat Samuel Tilden 185 to 184.\n\nIn response to the two above answers, there is an even number of electors, 538, and the Senate chooses the Vice President in the event of a tie, not the president

question_title: How can I get immigration help filling out the forms to marry a girl from the philippines? [SEP] question_content: I've already met her and known her for 2 years, so its just filling out the paperwork properly so not to have it rejected. Things like a cover letter, what step by step needs to be filled out in which order and filed. [SEP] best_answer: Most of the information is available at:
http://www.uscis.gov/ start with the FAQ section

If you read carefully you should have no problem figuring it out but it'll take some time...

Basically you have 2 options:
1) get married in her country and file at the local US consulate 
2)get a K-1 fiance visa and get married in the US

It takes around 1 year for everything normally but it varies. Option number 2 is best if you want her to be with you in the US during the processing period, use option 1 if you want to be with her in her country during the processing period (she can't come to the US until it's approved)

If you think you need professional help, other then a lawyer, you can see http://www.nolo.com/
They have very decent prices, lawyers cost thousands and don't do much.

question_title: Whats worse,big brother listening in on phone calls or big brother telling you that you can't smoke? [SEP] question_content: Or you get a ticket for not wearing a seatbelt? Little by little our rights are being took away, but most people only look at the ones that help with terrorism. [SEP] best_answer: I don't really think Big Brother is listening to all our phone calls. Big Brother just doesn't have that much time and help.

Not smoking? Here in FL people pretty much can't smoke indoors anymore, except in bars. That was a law passed by the voters. As a non smoker, even though I did not vote for it, it sure doesn't bother me to sit in a restaurant and not breathe in second hand smoke.

I'm also all for the seat belt law. Aside from it protecting children, it also protects other people in the car from the 200 pound projectiles that morons become in an accident when they don't want to buckle up.

Bottom line (IMHO)-
I don't really think that not wearing a seat belt is a right, as driving is a privilege. And since secondhand smoke has been proven harmful, I don't think people should be forced to be exposed to it.

The phone calls- that's something else. I do think there should be just cause for listening in on private conversations.

question_title: At airports, is there a limit as to how much cash you can carry? [SEP] question_content: A customer at work asked me this question and I had no idea.  He said that a friend of his told him that a maximum of $10,000 (U.S. dollars) can be carried at the airport because of added security from drug dealers.  Is this true? [SEP] best_answer: You could carry as much as you want at the airport, in trash bags if you like. Carrying it onto an airplane that is leaving the country is where it gets tricky.

The US Customs service says that you can only take $10,000 without declaring it. Actually, if you declare it, in theory you could take any amount out of the country. 

Some countries actually do have limits as to how much money you can take into their borders, so you have to be careful at both ends of the trip.

Here are the facts straight from the Customs Bureau:

It is legal to transport any amount of currency or other monetary instruments into or out of the United States.  However, if you transport, attempt to transport, or cause to be transported currency or other monetary instruments in an aggregate amount exceeding $10,000 (or its foreign  equivalent) at one time from the United States to any foreign place, or into the United States from any foreign place, you must file a report with U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP).  This report is called the Report of International Transportation of Currency or Monetary Instruments, FinCEN Form 105 (http://www.fincen.gov/forms/fin105_cmir.pdf).  These forms can be obtained at all U.S. ports of entry and departure.  You may continue to use a Customs Form 4790, the predecessor of FinCEN Form 105, to file the report until such forms are exhausted.  

In addition to the above requirement, if you as an individual or on behalf of an entity recognized as legal personalities (i.e. a company, corporation, partnership, etc.) sends, mails or ships monetary instruments to the United States from a foreign country valued at $10,000 or more, you are required to file a report with CBP before sending the monetary instruments to the recipient in the foreign country or in the United States.  If you or a legal personality you are affiliated with in the United States receives monetary instruments valued at $10,000 or more, sent via mail, ship, or express courier, you are also required to report to CBP.  You are required to file the report within 15 days upon receipt of the monetary instruments.

question_title: what laws apply when dj'ing mp3's or burnt cd's in public? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: Among others, there are potential trademark issues and potential copyright issues.

Copyright protections, set forth in federal law (see Title 17, below) include limitations on public performance, depending upon license rights. Willful violation of federal copyright laws can be very expensive, so check with an entertainment law attorney if there is any doubt as to your legal rights to use the music.

Also, there may be trademark and unfair competition issues, under either federal or state laws, that could apply when names of bands are used to implicitly endorse an event.

Of course, any local or state laws regarding public gatherings, commercial endeavors, etc. may also apply.

question_title: Does anyone here like  to go to jury duty? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: I've never been called to be on a jury.

Most people I've talked to who have been called to a jury have stated that it was just a waste of their time.

The concept of a jury is a good one, though, and the purpose it serves is valuable. Having a jury could mean the difference in civil suits where a plaintiff does or does not get the relief they seek. Juries in criminal cases are required since so much of the criminal law has to do with "what was reasonable" and other intangibles that should be left for the "every day man or woman to decide."

Torts cases (and, boy, are there a lot) benefit from juries because the elements of "reasonableness" are present. 

Juries, in theory, protect the innocent from being prosecuted unfairly and help to insure that plaintiffs who had been wronged get the damages they are seeking. Juries, however, aren't perfect because they are so often comprised of un-educated people who often let their biases get in the way of justice (only 1/4 of America's adult population is undergraduate college-educated; less than 10% of the adult population has some sort of graduate or professional schooling).

question_title: Is throwing up after you eat dangerous? [SEP] question_content: All my friends say that it is and I've stopped but every now and then I continue to do it. [SEP] best_answer: YES!!
Diagnostic Criteria
Recurrent episodes of binge eating. An episode of binge eating is characterized by both of the following: 
eating, in a discrete period of time (e.g., within any 2-hour period), an amount of food that is definitely larger than most people would eat during a similar period of time and under similar circumstances 
a sense of lack of control over eating during the episode (e.g., a feeling that one cannot stop eating or control what or how much one is eating) 
Recurrent inappropriate compensatory behavior in order to prevent weight gain, such as self-induced vomiting; misuse of laxatives, diuretics, enemas, or other medications; fasting; or excessive exercise. 
The binge eating and inappropriate compensatory behaviors both occur, on average, at least twice a week for 3 months. 
Self-evaluation is unduly influenced by body shape and weight. 
The disturbance does not occur exclusively during episodes of Anorexia Nervosa. 
Specify type:
Purging Type: during the current episode of Bulimia Nervosa, the person has regularly engaged in self-induced vomiting or the misuse of laxatives, diuretics, or enemas 
Nonpurging Type: during the current episode of Bulimia Nervosa, the person has used other inappropriate compensatory behaviors, such as fasting or excessive exercise, but has not regularly engaged in self-induced vomiting or the misuse of laxatives, diuretics, or enemas 
 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Differential Diagnosis
Anorexia Nervosa; Binge-Eating/Purging Type; Kleine-Levin syndrome; Major Depressive Disorder, With Atypical Features; Borderline Personality Disorder.

question_title: How can I just shut-up? [SEP] question_content: I mean I notice some people work through their problems inside and talk about it later. But I  always seem to talk my problems out and later wish I kept it to myself. i can' t stop, when I have a problem it is like an uncontrolable urge to talk to someone to help sort it out... How can I just shut-up when I feel out of control, like a baloon about to explode until I talk it out? [SEP] best_answer: I understand your dilemma, because I used to be this way myself. I would find myself talking about things in my life that should have been private to almost anyone, and occasionally, I still do.  I am not a psychologist or a psychiatrist, so basically, this is just coming from my experience and opinions.  I think the reason that you tell others about your problems is that either 1. you don't trust yourself to solve them or 2. you don't want to take the responsibility of solving them yourself, in case you don't make the right decision.  You look to others' opinions and suggestions, even though you probably already know how you should handle the situation.\nIf you do this because of the 1st reason I mentioned, you don't trust yourself to solve your problems on your own, it is most likely due to a lack of self-esteem.  You don't value your own opinion enough to believe that you are capable of managing your own life. In this case, you need to learn to believe in yourself. Counseling/therapy, support groups, or even a self-help book may be somethings to try, maybe even all of them. But, if self-esteem is the case, I'm sure that this is not the only are of your life being affected.\nIf it is the 2nd reason, you don't want to take the responsibility of solving your problems yourself, in case you don't make the right decision, you have to acknowledge that this is what you are doing, and consciously make an effort to make these decisions and take the responsibility.  It is easier to blame someone else if something goes wrong, "It's not my fault, I was just following their advice".  The only problem with that is that it IS still your fault anyway.....you are the one who made the decision to take THAT advice!  At least if you make the decisions yourself, you will have some things to rely on that are better than other people's opinions, like your gut feeling, your thoughts and experiences, and your conscience to help you make the decisions that YOU believe are right.......and at least you'll have that to fall back on.

question_title: Why am I so cold? [SEP] question_content: I have iron-deficiency anemia, but I can't figure out why my hands are constantly so cold even when it's 90+ degrees. In the winter, they turn blue and purple because they're so cold. Also, could my being anemic affect my running? I have found that even with intense training, my body still gets tired quickly when I run. [SEP] best_answer: My mother has Reynaud's Disease and her hands and feet are always cold.  You should get to a doctor and talk with them in detail about the issues with your hands as well as any others.  You may have Reynaud's or some other issue with circulation.  Also, if you have Reynaud's, you may have something else as well, such as scleroderma or some other auto-immune disease.  Check with your doctor and don't let them tell you it's nothing!

question_title: I have pain near my ovaries, more prevalent right before my cyclepap and sono found nada.  Ideas? [SEP] question_content: It seems to be worse during intercourse, right before my period, and if I sit for long periods.  The gyno said she found nothing to go back to my general pratitioner, and the general doctor said it has to be in my reproductive system, so go to the gyno.  I now dont know who to go to.  Has anyone had this type of pain, or any suggestions?  The pain is a stabbing pain when it is bad that fades to a dull throbbing pain.  It is there all the time, but worse right before my period.  During intercourse it seems to be hit and pain is intense. [SEP] best_answer: Have they done an ultrasound on your ovaries? From what you describe, it sounds like ovarian cysts, or fibroids. Maybe you can ask your GP to refer you to an endocrinologist, they might be able to help you out. In the meantime you could take Evening Primrose Oil, 1 capsule 3 times a day, you should be able to find it at any health food store, or anyplace that sells natural supplements. I have Polycystic Ovarian Disease, and I found that this was the best treatment for the pain.( if you find it doesn't work, have your GP prescribe Anaprox, it's also a very good pain reliever)


 Good Luck to you and I hope you feel better.

question_title: When should my Period Start? [SEP] question_content: I had an IUD(Minera) put in on September 19th and started Spotting that same day. Then on September 25th I started bleeding like a normal period flow. And that lasted like a normal period flow till October 23rd. Then I spotted for a couple days then done. And then Spotting again for about a week and a half. And now I'm just lightly spotting off and on. I would think that my period should be here again by now but nothing. Anyone know when I should expect it. I'm not entirely sure because how long i had AF for before. I have also had one more period sense having my son. I had Post Pardum bleeding from 4 1/2 weeks then stopped bleeding till i was 6 1/2 week Post pardum. then on Aug 31st started AF Till September 9th. I'm lost....I just want to know when to expect my period. I would have assumed it should have been here a couple days ago or something.

I am Also Breast Feeding almost 100%...But still got a normal Period before getting the IUD put in. [SEP] best_answer: Its normal to have abnormal bleeding during the 1st year of the IUD. I had mine put in 4 wks post partum and breastfed 100% until my son was 1 year old. I can tell you I spotted more the 1st 3 months I was on the Mirena and then it stopped and now 3 yrs later I have no period and no spotting. The cramping might be due to the breastfeeding. Your uterus does contract while breastfeeding. Did you have it checked out after insertion to verify its positioning? If so I wouldn't really worry it may take anywhere from 3months to 1 year for your body to fully adjust to the IUD.
CONGRATS on the baby and on Breastfeeding 100%!!!!!
Good luck

question_title: anyone know a healthy and/or natural way to reduce and ultimately get rid of cellulite? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: I use to work in the beauty industry and I can tell you those topical products will only reduce the appearance, not get rid of it. Plus you have to continue using them. They are not a permanent fix. Cellulite has more to do with heredity and your skin than how fit you are. Even the most fit athletic people have body fat but it only shows on your skin if you have thin and/or fair skin (like me :)). Skin damage, like from the sun, only will make it worse so don't think you you can disguise it by making your skin darker with tanning beds or sun exposure. You will only damage your skin further and cause even worse problems like spider veins, freckles, or even a melanoma. My best advice is just eat healthy and exercise and embrace your body the way God created it. It is a miraculous machine that is perfection in itself even if those airbrushed fashion magazines try to convine you otherwise.

question_title: Advice on neck and shoulder pain where to seek treament? [SEP] question_content: For past 3 weeks painful right side neck. Now pain on right and left and down through shoulders. No relief from sleep or neck exercises and cold packs. [SEP] best_answer: Go see your doctor.  He can run tests to diagnose the cause of the pain and then make appropriate recommendations.  He can prescribe pain meds and/or muscle relaxers if needed.  Also, he may recommend physical therapy, chiropractic care, or massage therapy as options to improve your condition.

The type of pain you have will dictate treatment.  Is is a muscle spasm?  You may want to try hot pack.  Is it sharp, shooting pain?  Stick with the ice.  Is there numbnesss or tingling involved?  This may be due to a nerve problem.

What time of day is your pain worst?  In the AM would indicate chemical changes in your body (arthritis, inflammation).  In the PM would indicate your pain is mechanical in nature - meaning your posture or body mechanics (think office ergonomics!) could be the problem.

question_title: can you have a child after a tubal ligation? thats when  the doctor burns your tubes and cuts them.? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: The "accidental" pregnancy rate after tubal ligation is approximately 1 out of 200 women [Medline]. However, the rate of ectopic pregnancy risk is also drastically increased in women who have undergone TL [about 7 ectopic pregnancies per 1,000 procedures - may not seem like a lot unless you are the one w/the ectopic].

If desired, the ligation can also be medically reversed, resulting in pregnancy in about 50-80% of those undergoing reversal, depending on the population being studied.

Good luck, hope it turns out as you wish.

question_title: I need to lose 15-20 pounds in the next 5 weeks. What's the quickest way to do it? [SEP] question_content: MY MAIN PROBLEM IS MY WAIST/STOMACH AREA. I NEED TO KNOW THE QUICKEST, MOST EFFECTIVE AB WORKOUT THAT ACTUALLY WORKS! MY FIANCE DECIDED AT THE VERY LST MINUTE HE WANTS TO GO TO A HIGH SCHOOL REUNION AND I WANT TO LOOK GREAT! [SEP] best_answer: The quickest way isn't always the best way or the right way for you. Here are 3 different approaches that work:

1) The quickest by far is surgery, of course. Liposuction is fast and works wonders- but actual stomach reductions (stapling, bypass etc) have not only been proven effective for weightloss but also in reducing the chances you'll develop adult onset diabetes.

2) Next fastest is to eat a diet of 80% natural fats and 20% protein, in 5 small portions, with a target of 1000 calories a day. This is like eating a 2 oz bag of macadamia nuts, or 2 oz of egg salad or tuna salad as a complete meal, every meal. It works- and for any significant amount of weight it's better than starvation. More importantly the high fat content of the diet ensures that your body continues to produce the hormones you need to retain muscle tissue- so you lose fat pounds and not muscle pounds.

3) Probably the best long term solution to lose weight and improve your health is to follow a light excercise routine several times per week, and to eat a diet that is high in fiber and has a low glycemic index (that is- eat foods that are low in processed sugar and grains, preferring when you eat carbohydrates to try whole grains and natural sugars).

question_title: Why the first things that medical doctor do in the hospital is measuring temperature and blood pressure? [SEP] question_content: is the body temperature and blood pressure determine the person's health? [SEP] best_answer: They are both very good indicators of whether something is wrong. They are the basic vital signs of the body. An elevated temperature can indicate that there is an infection, as your body fights whatever is going on it causes your temp. to go up. Then there are times that a person body temp. goes down. The whole purpose though is so that they have a baseline to work with. They continue to monitor those things and so they will know whether it has gone up or down. The blood pressure is very important. It can tell them alot. Again it is very important to have a baseline to go by. They do indicate if there is a problem. although it doesn't necessarily mean there is something wrong. They just need to have an initial reading so that they have something to go by.

question_title: hi i want to lose 15 kilos in 2 to 3 months.how can i do that?its emergency? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: The quickest way is to cut out red meats, starches, breads, sugars, alcohal, and sodas.

Eat veggies (salads are good), soups, and drink TONS of water. If you get hungry between a meal, drink water to fill up.

In moderation eat white meats, and fruits (fruits contain natural sugars, and that can put on weight)

Practice portion control. Yes, you'll feel hungry at first, but think of your goal, and soon your stomach will start shrinking and you won't have that feeling anymore.

Eat 5 times a day. A small breakfast. A mid-morning snack, such as an apple. A small lunch. A mid-afternoon snack, such as carrots. A lite dinner. Do not eat any later than 7pm (6pm is better.)

Go exercise for at least an hour a day, incorporating weight training. Weight training builds muscle. Muscle burns fat. You get the idea. It also gives tone and definition. 

Good luck!!

question_title: how to get relieved from strain? [SEP] question_content:  [SEP] best_answer: Apply ice immediately to reduce swelling. Wrap the ice in cloth -- avoid using ice directly on the skin. Apply ice for 10 to 15 minutes every 1 hour for the first day. Then, every 3 to 4 hours. 
Use ice for the first 3 days. After that, either heat or ice may be helpful. 
Rest the pulled muscle for at least a day. If possible, keep the pulled muscle elevated above the level of the heart. 
Avoid using a strained muscle while it is still painful. When the pain subsides, start activity slowly and in moderation.

question_title: Dis-association / Ana / abuse HELP? [SEP] question_content: I have never felt 'in my body' and have always felt like I am in my own world - I interact and I am functional (great job etc) from the 'outside' but I'm feeling more and more like a fraud human!
I was molested and abused a bit when I was younger (though compared to some people, its quite minimal) and I just feel that I never got a chance to connect with my body. I've been struggling with anorexia and bulimia for 10 years now. I felt happiest when I was anorexic (still in recovery) because I looked exactly how I felt. I want to be ana again. 

I look at people in the street and think 'what the hell? how are they living? I look at people I have known my whole life and think 'who are you?!' I feel like they are almost strangers and I've been sleepwalking my whole life!
How can I 'wake up', how can I 'heal' and start to feel like I am alive? [SEP] best_answer: This is a tough one.

To feel completely separated from your sense of Self and your body goes hand-in-hand with eating disorders. Do you self-injure, too?

An eating disorder is actually a means of someone asserting control over their life when they feel they have very little. It is rarely a symptom of someone who wants to be thin, though it's very common that someone w/an eating disorder hates themself and wants to do themself harm.

Bulimia is a very common disease with successful, charismatic women who endure a lot of stress at work or in life in general.

I had to come at my bulimia and self-harm from a few different angles. Firstly, I got myself a good book -- The Secret Language of Eating Disorders by Peggy Claude-Pierre. I read it and took note of the things she said that resonated with me most.

I saw a therapist once a week for two years. It was pricey but completely necessary. It helped more than I can describe. Just telling someone about how awful you feel and how alienated you think you are, and having them console you and validate your feelings, is powerfully healing.

Start to write down things you like about yourself. Keep track of details  during the day that make you feel connected to yourself. Treat yourself to things throughout the day -- a positive thought, an inside joke with yourself, a cup of tea, anything.

I can relate to wanted to go back to your eating disorder. It feels safe and consistent and when you look at yourself and see your body as the result of your own control, well, it feels great. A therapist will help you with this. find a support group and meet with the people there. The strengths of others are extremely powerful during times like these.

question_title: Help!! Side effects from Implanon? [SEP] question_content: Ok I have had a period for 8months its has stoped now but did anybody experience this...... Note,  dont wanna hear people say everbody is different only serious answer here ok!! [SEP] best_answer: Implanon contains progestin which carries the risk of some very serious side effects:
- suppress production of natural progesterone in the body.
- disrupt the steroid hormone pathways, which can cause both immediate and/or insidious undermining of both adrenal and gonadal function. Since a steroid hormone pathway is fundamental to energy and vitality, these drugs are usually a prescription for chronic fatigue (and probably fibromyalgia).
- depression
- anxiety, nervousness
- fatigue, leading to chronic fatigue over time
- fluid retention and breast tenderness, weight gain
- migraine
- angina, palpitations
- menstrual irregularities, spotting
- glucose intolerance; promotes insulin resistance
- general edema
- nausea
- insomnia, sleepiness
- skin rashes, acne
- hair loss on scalp, facial hair growth
- Coronary artery spasm - This is most significant: 90% of men who have heart attacks have atherosclerosis or obstruction of coronary arteries, but only 30% of women do. The majority of women who have heart attacks do so because of coronary artery spasm.
- Stroke
- Pulmonary embolism
- Implicated in causing breast cancer
- sudden or partial loss of vision
- liver disease
- Increases the risk of birth defects
- Gall bladder disease

The 2001 PDR states this about progestins: "The effect of prolonged use of this drug on pituitary, ovarian, adrenal, hepatic or uterine functions is unknown".


And who knows if Implanon users will incur the numerous problems -- such as injury upon removal -- that forced Wyeth to pull Norplant from the market six years ago in the face of numerous health-related lawsuits.
